channel.title: Easy Guide to Making a server?
channel.description:
All the guides seem Complicated :( Is there an easy way just to get a source and get it up and running with out editing,
its like all too complicated and dont tell me to read the guide or watever im not spending days reading some guide

wtf isnt that what your asking for??? and calling me a noob isnt helping your situation any
